title: France panorama. [No. 73?/01]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items: 1. Super subway. 2. Fashion designers. 3. Paco Ibanez in a recording studio and performing at a nightclub. 4. Arts and letters - dignitary from Senegal admitted to the Academy; artworks, paintings and sculpture find a new home, The Pavilion. 5. Christmas in Paris - President Pompidou entertains 600 children in the Palace at Christmas; tour of Paris luxury shops.
